attributes.action: Ban all christmas products and affliates appearing before November 5th
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is absolutely ridiculous how we are bombarded about Christmas from as early as September. It should not be allowed til after bonfire night. Lights, cards, wrapping paper, songs, adverts, window displays, advent calenders. The whole lot. It takes the joy out of christmas because it's around for so long that it loses meaning and impact. Save Christmas for Christmas
